issue.title: List for users notification
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In Front-end Resources Diffusion screen, the diffusion manager can add users to be notified when an order is sent for the resource (see attached screenshot).

The user list expose all the users of the platform --> it should not be the case.

The list should only expose :
- the users in the same organism as the selected resource
- the users in the same organism as the user who is editing the current form (in case of delegation)


Am I write ?

Thanks for feedback.


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
